T02D2039:139b-1: de wi dha ra pra bh'a aa dhishth'a na /
T02D2039:139b-3: lha mo 'od 'dzin ma'i byin gyis brlab pa bcom
T02D2039:139b-4: ldan 'das gti mug dga' ma la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D2039:139b-5: // ma lus srid pa'i gti mug rnams //
T02D2039:139b-6: mthar byed ma la rab btud nas //
T02D2039:139b-7: spros med bdud rtsi za ba yi //
T02D2039:139b-8: ting nge 'dzin gyis byin brlab bshad //
T02D2039:139b-9: mandala la sogs lta gon te //
T02D2039:139b-10: bdag bskyed bzlas pa mchod gtor dang //
T02D2039:139b-11: 'khor lo tshogs kyis mnyes byas la //
T02D2039:139b-12: yon bcas dang pa'i slob ma la //
T02D2039:139b-13: sdom pa byin la dam la gzhag / de nas 'dun pa drag po yis //
T02D2039:139b-14: bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab //
T02D2039:139b-15: padma'i dbus gnas zla ba la //
T02D2039:139b-16: aom skyes lha mo mnyam bzhengs dkar //
T02D2039:139b-17: chu shel gri gug padma'i snod //
T02D2039:139b-18: thugs kar 'dzin pa rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D2039:139b-20: de lta'i gnyis ka gsal byas nas //
T02D2039:140a-2: lha mo 'thon te snying gar gzhug / de yi brang dkyil aom skyes pa //
T02D2039:140a-3: gri gug aas mtshan thod nang du //
T02D2039:140a-4: phyed nub tsam du bsam par bya //
T02D2039:140a-5: de yi 'od kyis khams gsum gyi //
T02D2039:140a-7: bdag med shes rab dam pa yis //
T02D2039:140a-8: sangs rgyas mchod de de rnams kyis //
T02D2039:140a-9: stong nyid ye shes bkug la bstim //
T02D2039:140a-10: thod pa'i 'od kyis srid gsum gyi //
T02D2039:140a-12: zag med bde par gshegs pa mchod //
T02D2039:140a-13: mi rtog bde chen ye shes mchog / bkug la gnyis su med par bya //
T02D2039:140a-14: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde stong gi / ye shes zung 'jug rmad byung gis //
T02D2039:140a-15: bdud rtsis lus gang brtan g-yo yi //
T02D2039:140a-16: bcud bsdus ngo bor bsam byas la //
T02D2039:140a-17: bla ma'i ting 'dzin nus pas dbab //
T02D2039:140a-18: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2039:140a-19: aa mo ha ra ti a'a gatstsha ya a'a gatstsha ya h'um h'um dza dza dza ya /
T02D2039:140a-28: 'phar dang g-ya' dang dgod pa dang //
T02D2039:140a-29: bde stong nyams ni skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2039:140a-30: ji srid bran du khas blangs nas //
T02D2039:140a-31: yon phul mnyes pas dam tshig bzhin //
T02D2039:140a-32: bla ma bsten la brtson par bya //
T02D2039:140a-33: bla ma blo mi bde ba yi //
T02D2039:140a-34: slob ma'i dngos grub 'dod pa ni //
T02D2039:140a-35: chur shes smig rgyu ji bzhin no //
T02D2039:140a-36: ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi byin rlabs grub
T02D2039:140a-37: thob kyi bdag po mkhas pa chen po dpal 'dzin
T02D2039:140a-40: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba a'a ka ra dang /
T02D2039:140a-41: lo ts'a ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba las /
T02D2039:140a-42: dus phyis rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta darba
T02D2039:140a-43: na a'a ts'arya dang lo ts'a ba dge slong rdo
T02D2039:140a-44: rje 'dzin pa zhe sdang rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus
T02D2039:140a-45: te slar dag par byas so //
